chunks.lyrics: So I made Archipelago: THE VERSION FOR DUMMIES. It's step by freaking step,
because really it's just the same thing over and over, but I tabbed the whole
thing out with the lyrics and everything so that it's straightforward and what
not. A lot of copying and pasting, I might add. Anyway, it's the whole thing, so enjoy!!
